1.title: Response time (Avg)
1.query:
timeseries avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.response_time = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.service.request.response_time)`)
| sort service.request.response_time desc
| limit 20

2.title: Errors
2.query:
timeseries avg(dt.service.request.failure_count), by: { dt.entity.service }
| fieldsAdd service.request.failure_count = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.service.request.failure_count)`)
| sort service.request.failure_count desc
| limit 20
